name: Atma's Portal
loreDescription: By going through that door, you can turn back time. It may be for a brief moment, but it's enough to gain momentum in a fight.

skillDescription.base: 10.0% chance to decrease skill cooldown of all allies by 1 turn at the beginning of the battle.
skillDescription.max: 20.0% chance to decrease skill cooldown of all allies by 1 turn at the beginning of the battle.
